title: Industrial Training Portal

title: Pera Hockey Match Scheduler
description: A web application to generate match schedules avoiding conflicts in multiple courts, allowing intermediate idle times.

title: MyStay.lk

title: Realtime Multiplayer Game
description: A realtime 2D-shooter-game. Handles over 80,000 concurrent requests at 100 requests per second over WebSockets.

title: Industrial Training Portal 2016

title: IoT Hub
description: [ACADEMIC PROJECT] An IOT Hub, to enable authorization, authentication, communication and data analysis for any custom IOT device given the configurations.
